resp.text: Thanks for the time to give us a good review, Berry! We appreciate you and hope to be able to assist you again soon!

name: Summer Burnette
text: I work for Affordable Tree Services we use this company frequently!! These guys are a great help to us!! They are always promt-fast-and ready to help us out. Thank you for your hard work!!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We can’t wait to have you back at RGA.
Thank you for the wonderful review.  Our priority is customer service and we are ecstatic that we met that mark! Great customers like you make our job a pleasure.
Thank you so much for the positive rating. We're happy that you're happy, and we're looking forward to your next visit to RGA.

name: Blake Stephenson
text: Always a great experience.  They supply all of our gasket and o-ring needs, sometimes making them on the spot.  I highly recommend this business to anyone in need of neoprene,  rubber or paper gaskets.

resp.text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. We're glad that customers like you are having a great experience at RGA.
Thank you so much for your positive rating for your recent visit to RGA.

name: Lex Jennings
text: Great people to work with, everyone is willing to go the extra mile as a team for their customers.

resp.text: Lex, thanks for your review! It's great to hear about your experience. Come back soon!

name: Z. D.
text: Hose, gaskets, orings, and conveyor belt items available.

resp.text: We're happy to see that you had a 5-Star experience. Thanks for sharing!

name: Lance G
text: These guys have been in Huntsville at this location forever. I've gone in over the years for random gaskets, o rings and seals that I would have never been able to find anywhere else. They've always been so helpful with me and very cheap afa prices.
